mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, email, password, role, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{username}, #{email}, #{password}, COALESCE(#{role}, 'USER'), NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET username = #{username}, email = #{email}, password = #{password}, role = #{role}, failed_login_attempts = #{failed_login_attempts}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
